name: no-as-a-service
title: No as a Service
description:
Get a random reason to say no. 

Inspired by https://github.com/hotheadhacker/no-as-a-service
author: nedini

commands.name: random-no
commands.title: Random No
commands.subtitle: No as a Service
commands.description: Generate a creative reason to decline a request.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
